successNotification.signup: Your signup has completed successfully. Please check your e-mail inbox, and use the activation link sent to you, to finish the registration process.
successNotification.password: If provided e-mail was correct, your password should have been reset. Please check your inbox for a link allowing you to set a new password.

signupConfirmation.title: Account activation
signupConfirmation.success: Your account has been successfully activated!
